Portal 2 is one of the best games I've ever played. Its unique puzzle design, dark but funny humor, unforgetable characters, amazing scenery, fluid mechanics and beautiful music all come together to make one of the most replayable experiences on the entire game market. 

Tldr; If you haven't already, buy the damn game. You will NOT regret it. I can assure you.
A 10 year old game that stands up to the test of time. You won't regret the purchase.
Best game I have ever played
more addictive than portal 1 and portal 1 is more addictive than heroine
I've played this game since I was 5 believe me it's good
Juego con historia y puzles, me encanta

RECOMENDADOâœ”
It is just a beautiful game, and almost every time I complete a hard area I had an "Aha" moment.
The game is good and is really funny, the puzzles are challenging and fair.

this game was fantastic. the puzzle became just a tad more challenging which made the solutions even more satisfying. the story truly interested me and i see glados in a different perspective. the context was easy to understand and it runs very well :)

An awesome sequence to a fantastic game! Do yourself a favor and play it, that is, if you're into puzzle games. The gameplay time has been extended and is now more reasonable, since I felt like the first game felt a bit on the short side. Mechanics have been improved upon and are introduced throughout the playthrough. On top of that, I found the story very engaging and charming.
good yes potato the cake is a lie

this is one of my top 3 games ever. the puzzles are amazing, the mechanics are perfect, and the fun cast of characters really make this game one of the best ive played. the story/lore that this franchise has is so well thought out. i heard about this game some 3-4 years ago thinking it was too over hyped. boy was i wrong

Absolutely loved the first Portal! I finished that game back in High School about 10 years ago. I stopped playing PC games for a number or years and just started playing again and both games has aged wonderfully. Portal 2 is just as fun and funny as the original. My son and I have been playing together and it's been fun to watch him fall in the love with this game too. Highly recommend it!
best game i have ever played

A fantastic sequel to a timeless classic building on the previous story and making it a million times better any fan of puzzle game should definitely check this and Portal 1 out a amazing way to get into valve/pc games and one of my top time favourite games. 10000/10
